definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]

sentences.english: The machine is controlled by micro-computer, and it adopts stepping motor to feed materials.
sentences.chinese: 本机采用微机电脑控制，步进电机拖料。

sentences.english: This article deals with automatic entry method of microcomputer business accounting system.
sentences.chinese: 本文详细介绍了微机商业会计自动化分录登帐方法。

sentences.english: Make use of campus services like the health center and computer labs.
sentences.chinese: 利用好校园的各种服务，比如校园医护中心和微机房。

sentences.english: Microcomputer system of spinning-machine is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了纺丝机微机控制系统的研制。

sentences.english: You have to take off your shoes before getting into the computer room.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，在进入微机室之前，你得先把你的鞋子脱掉。

sentences.english: PC-based or stand-alone motion controllers for two, four, six or eight axes.
sentences.chinese: 微机或单机运动控制器为两，四，六，八轴。

sentences.english: The track like data structure which resembles the track layouts in stations, is an important part of a PC based interlocking software system.
sentences.chinese: 站场形数据结构是微机联锁软件系统的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: At present, because of the application of computer, the performance of torque measuring instrument has been improved greatly.
sentences.chinese: 目前，由于微机的应用，转矩测量仪性能大大提高。

sentences.english: The computer room can hold 70 students.
A new microcomputerized Fetal Electrocardiograph (FECG) is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍一种微机化胎儿心电图仪。

sentences.english: This method can be used in other kind of micro- processor based systems.
sentences.chinese: 可以推广应用于其它类型的微机系统中。

sentences.english: This paper describes the fundamentals of inspecting the wiper permanent magnet motors by the aid of microcomputer.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了刮水器永磁电机微机检测的基本原理。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a fully computerized cardiac programmable stimulator .
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种全微机化的程控心脏刺激仪系统。

sentences.english: Traditional manual meter reading will be replaced by the computer remote concentrated meter reading.
sentences.chinese: 微机远程集中抄表正逐渐替代传统的人工抄表。

sentences.english: The program for computer to calculate the formulation was given.
sentences.chinese: 列举了微机计算色漆配方的程序。

sentences.english: She would sit in the computer lab at her university and we'd talk into the early morning.
sentences.chinese: 她坐在她的大学的微机室，和我聊天直到凌晨。

pinyin: wang3 luo4 guan3 li3 xi4 tong3
